content.value:
I wanted to cook something banging to close out 2020 because it’s been a far-from banging year.

Reverse-seared ribeye, chunky chips and gratin dauphinois with some seared asparagus, mushrooms and pepper sauce (off screen)
content.html: I wanted to cook something banging to close out 2020 because it’s been a far-from banging year. Reverse-seared ribeye, chunky chips and gratin dauphinois with some seared asparagus, mushrooms and pepper sauce (off screen)

photo.alt: The meal as described in the tweet
